alert.note: Alert for Dearborn (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:20AM EDT until June 17 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT FOR OHIO...SOUTHWESTERN DEARBORN...SWITZERLAND...CENTRAL BOONE AND CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 1119 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Dillsboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Rising Sun, Warsaw, Florence, Pleasant, Glencoe, Fairview, Patriot, Center Square, Aberdeen, Interstate 71 at US Route 127, Waterloo, Steele Bottom, Markland, Avonburg, Moorefield, Farmers Retreat, Rabbit Hash, Quercus Grove, Mount Sterling and North Landing. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 62 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
